name: Project E (Goncalo Oliveira)
description:
Project E is a 3rd person adventure and exploration game with procedural generated worlds where the player is placed in a world of misteries and tries to discover hidden secrets left by an extinguished civilization. The project is being developed by a group of 5 people  and this first demo was made as a final project for the course of Video Game Design in IPB college. 

The main objective with this project was to develop a prototype where we explore design methods and technics with procedural content generation in an exploration game. The game is highly inspired by The Legend of Zelda - Breath of The Wild and Souls Like games and it already counts with the following features:

  • Fully procedural generated open world with various regions to explore, enemies to fight and chests to loot;
  • A fire temple and dungeon to explore;
  • Two types of enemies (golems and fire crocodiles) and a boss fight;
  • Complex fighting system heavily inspired by Souls Like games;
  •  Various items and weapons to collect (swords, spells, potions, shields, masks, bombs and totems);
  • Elemental damage system with weaknesses and resistances to certain damage types (physical damage, fire damage and shock damage).

We plan on improving and adding into this project in future updates with features like more dungeons, items, adding audio (duh!), enemies and bosses, performance optimization, more damage types and more! So stay tunned for future updates in our social media and here!

We hope you enjoy the game and feel free to provide feedback in the comments!
